Text:
Thanks for uploading this. There's no way to get this ReEnc from the usual cyberlockers anymore: the pastebin links BoB provided for this ep are both dead and multiple searches on FilesTube were also fruitless.

So again many thanks for the UL.

PS I wish BoB would release torrents as a matter of routine. Trawling through mutliple pastebin links, recaptchas, 404s,  "file removed" notices and Filestube searching makes klu9 cry :(
